events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me properly. I would like to return it and get a refund.
The customer's request has been categorized under refund due to a return request for a size issue.
Assigning the case to agent Sarah M. for refund handling and customer assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm Sarah, and I'd be happy to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in original packaging for processing the return?
Sure, my order number is 9384756. The jacket is new, still has tags attached, and has not been worn.
Thank you for the details. You can send the jacket back using the prepaid shipping label we'll email shortly, and once we receive it, we'll process a full refund within 5 business days.
That sounds perfect, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions.
I've sent the prepaid label to your email. Please let us know if you need any further assistance with the return process.
Just checking in to confirm you received our prepaid shipping label and to see if you need any help with your return.
Yes, I got the label and shipped the jacket yesterday. Thanks for following up.
We have processed your refund today. You should see the amount back on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
We appreciate your business and would love your feedback. Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey.
Thank you for contacting us. We are closing this case now but feel free to reach out anytime for further assistance.
The refund case has been archived for record-keeping and future reference as per company policy.
